devdoc.author: @vonnie610 (GitHub)
devdoc.details: The registry contract. Conforms to it's interface

constructor.details: Sets the address of the admin contract

kill(bool).details: Allows the admin contract to kill the access control contract

removeUser(address).details: Allows the admin contract to remove a user

setVault(address).details: This allows admin addresses to update/set the address of the      vault contract

updateAccessControl(address).details: Allows the admin contract to update the access control contract

updateRole(address,uint8).details: Allows the admin to update the role of a user

kill(bool).notice: The access control contract will not self destruct, but all         functionality will be haulted.
